description.value: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness. Reduce your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] condition value by 1, and attempt a Fortitude save to recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened] condition as if you had spent an action retching; you reduce your sickened condition value by 1 on a failure (but not on a critical failure), by 2 on a success, or by 3 on a critical success.
